oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MAXIMUM ENTROPY SPECTRAL ESTIMATION FOR WIND WAVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Alverez, Jorge Calderon
Loureiro, Adolfo Maron
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wind waves
maximum entropy
wave spectrum
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Some results are presented on the application of new spectral estimation techniques using AR and ARMA models, also known as Maximum Entropy- Methods, to wind wave spectral analysis. The results are compared with those obtained with conventional FFT methods. The application of some mathematical methods for model order selection is included. The relation between the optimum order and different spectral parameters is investigated.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 20 (1986): Proceedings of 20th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Taipei, Taiwan, 1986.; 1
